item.title: [pi] Need some one to convert this please
item.dc:creator: @laakerules laakerules
item.description:
@laakerules wrote:

Here, since its so easy to do so!

if (i == 8106) {
	itemDef.modelID = 13701;
	itemDef.name = "Dragon KiteShield";
	itemDef.modelZoom = 1560;
	itemDef.modelRotation1 = 344;
	itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1104;
	itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
	itemDef.modelOffset2 = -6;
	itemDef.stackable = false;
	itemDef.value = 1;
	itemDef.membersObject = true;
	itemDef.maleEquip1 = 13700;
	itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 13700;
	itemDef.actions = new String[5];
	itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
	itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop";
	itemDef.anInt175 = 14;
	itemDef.anInt197 = 7;
}

item.description:
@zosai wrote:

I dont have a class 8 and i use itemdef_2

can some one please convert this so i can use it?.. i really need this:

if(i == 8106)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.aString170 = “Dragon kiteshield”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A rare, protective kiteshield.”.getBytes();
class8.anInt174 = 13701;
class8.anInt181 = 1560;
class8.anInt190 = 344;
class8.anInt198 = 1104;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = -6;
class8.anInt194 = -14;
class8.anInt165 = 13700;
class8.anInt200 = 13700;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
}

if you can convert this THANK YOU SO MUCH it would be much appreciated
